transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Yeah, hi sir, this side Ankita from IndiaMART.
Customer: Haan, bolo.
Executive: Hello. Sir, aapne jab, aapne jab renewal karaya tha, matlab ek concern aaya hai aapka brand change karane vagaira ko leke, thik hai?
Customer: Haan, change karna padega.
Executive: Sir, jab aapne renewal karaya tha, to pehli baar to aisi koi baat nahi hui thi ki hum brand change karenge.
Customer: Nahi, mere ko local, local person baat karne ke liye chahiye mere ko.
Executive: Sir, dekho, isse samjho, jahan se aap reh rahe ho.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi, dekhne ke liye kya kuch bhi nahi hai madam, mere ko Bangalore ka, Bangalore ka shift chahiye, utna hai bas.
Executive: Sir, jahan bhi IndiaMART service hi nahi deta, vahan ka kaise de de aapko, aap batao. Process.
Customer: Nahi, mere ko, local person chahiye, local aadmi chahiye mere ko.
Executive: Are sir, to hai hi nahi na. Mere ko jaana padega, aana padega, mere ko Bangalore mein office karna hai abhi. Mere ko udhar Bangalore mein, Bangalore mein mere ko chahiye. Wo chahiye wo shift Bangalore mein next level mein karta.
Executive: GST aap vahan ka kar lo na, GST vahan ka kar lo, main kaha mana kar rahi hu. GST jo hamara service area hai, vahan pe aap register kar lo, hum karva denge. Abhi ka jo aapka GST hai, wo serviceable nahi hai.
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: Nahi madam, nahi nahi, wo nahi hona chahiye.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Main keh rahi hu sir, aap jo GST hai abhi aapka, wo hamara jo service area hai, vahan ka kara lo, hum kar denge.
Customer: Kya hai madam?
Executive: GST pe jo address hai sir, address jahan ka aapne dal rakha hai, wo serviceable nahi hai. Wo koi bhi humne try kiya tha, baat kar lena Santosh se, maine unko bataya tha. But sir, jo hamara transfer karte hai na data.
Customer: Main wo call karta hu ek minute.
Executive: Karo, karo aap karo.

Executive: Neevu maathanaaduttiruva vyakthiyu nimma kareyannu hold nalli irisiddare. Dayavittu line nalli iri. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Neevu maathanaaduttiruva vyakthiyu nimma kareyannu hold nalli irisiddare. Dayavittu line nalli iri. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
Executive: Please stay on the line. Neevu maathanaaduttiruva.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Yes, yes, tell me madam.
Executive: Haan sir, Santosh hai line pe?
Customer: Haan, yes, yes madam, line pe hai. He is in on line. Haan, hello.
Executive: Yes madam. Haan, hello.
Executive: Santosh, are you there? Am I audible? Haan, audible, audible.
Executive: Okay, okay. So, abhi jo hamara case transfer karte hain, to hamare floor pe Himanshu.
Customer: Might you know him?
Executive: Yes.
Executive: Thik hai? So what happened, jo sir ka GST hai aur GST mein jo address hai, wo IndiaMART se serviceable nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi, ye point is available in Bangalore, client is available in Bangalore every time. I need to meet in Bangalore only, no excuse.
Executive: Thik hai. But as per process, as per process jo hota hai.
Customer: Already we collected 500 kilometer par ka client already we received. Already we are giving service to the client also.
Executive: Aap de rahe hoge, but samjho hamare floor pe jo chal raha hai, main wo bata rahi hu. Humne dala tha.
Customer: Why because already Ankita everybody is confirmed like that only. That is the reason.
Executive: Nobody confirm, nobody confirm. Santosh, nobody confirm at the time of payment.
Customer: Just you ask the client na, so mana kar diya client.
Executive: I asked him, I asked him. I asked him Santosh, jab wo area hi serviceable nahi hai, hume account dene mein koi problem nahi hai. But wo area serviceable nahi hai.
Customer: Client is like that only, please process.
Executive: Are sir, Santosh, what you are talking about? Client, every client have another demand.
Customer: No, client is saying is like that only, client is continuously calling me and then irritating me.
Executive: I, I understood. Okay, aapki jo, aapki, see, see, see, aapke, aapke jo head hai, aapke jo head hai, if they are, agar wo keh rahe hain ki wo kara lenge, to please tell him to talk with the management. We don't have any issue.
Customer: Yeah, already discussed with another person.
Executive: We don't have any. Aap mail kara do, aap mail.
Executive: Santosh, please listen to me. Aap mail kara do, hume koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Yes sir. Please try to understand but.
Executive: Vivek sir, Vivek sir and then regional RD, they told Santosh you can transfer the case to Bangalore branch and then tell him to client. So then we can wait for another one day.
Executive: Yes, yes, please do a mail, please do a mail because what happened in us.
Customer: Already sent the mail, already discussed, already mail said it is.
Executive: No, we haven't got any mail, we haven't got any mail.
Customer: No, already Himanshu Agarwal ko mail already bheja tha already. Our.
Executive: Take us, take us in the loop, take us in the loop because what happened na, right now we are not getting.
Customer: Tell me, so then I can send you.
Executive: Yeah, I will send you my, my senior mail ID everything. Please take us on the loop because what happened na, hume nahi pata right.
Customer: So do you have my number?
Executive: Yeah, I have your number.
Customer: Yeah, just you share your email ID so then you can forward.
Executive: I'm sharing, I'm sharing it, okay? Ramesh sir, hello.
Customer: Haan, Santosh.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ramesh sir, madthare, madthare, yen thondare illa. Naan maath kodthini, yen thondare illa. Haan. Okay.
Executive: Fine. Okay, okay.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to change brand location to Bangalore.

- Customer wants a local person to talk to.

- Customer states GST address is not serviceable.



Resolution:

- Executive explained IndiaMART doesn't provide service in that area.

- Executive asked customer to register GST in serviceable area.

- Executive requested customer to share email ID.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share email ID.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, serviceable area, brand change, local support
